text: Beth ElamenIn Arabic, this is called "Dar al-Maqbara" (). This means, "House of the cemetery". is the only Jewish cemetery in Beirut, capital of Lebanon. Its spelling in Hebrew is "", meaning: "House of Cemetery". The cemetery is very close to Sodeco Square. It can also be reached using the Damascus Expressway. ==Related pages== * Maghen Abraham Synagogue == Notes == Category:Buildings and structures in Beirut Category:Cemeteries
title: Beth Elamen Cemetery
